keyMoments.title: Journey to Training Location
keyMoments.description: Luffy travels with Rayleigh and Jinbe aboard the Kuja Pirates' ship toward his training location. The Kuja women ensure he rests properly on Hancock's orders.
keyMoments.significance: Begins Luffy's journey toward two years of intensive training that will make him stronger for the New World.

keyMoments.title: Worries About His Crew Understanding
keyMoments.description: Luffy expresses concern about whether his scattered crew will understand the hidden 3D2Y message he sent through the newspaper.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's growth as a captain who cares about communication with his crew, even when separated.

name.japanese: シルバーズ・レイリー

keyMoments.title: Reassures Luffy About His Crew
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh confidently tells Luffy that his crew will understand the message, though he humorously notes that one among them seems particularly dense.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Rayleigh's understanding of the Straw Hat crew's capabilities and sets up the reveal of Zoro's failure to comprehend the message.
keyMoments.quote: Don't worry, they will understand the message. Although there is one amongst them who seemed dull.

keyMoments.title: Fails to Understand the Message
keyMoments.description: Unlike all his other crewmates, Zoro completely fails to decipher Luffy's 3D2Y message due to his poor sense of direction and general denseness.
keyMoments.significance: Provides comedic relief while staying true to Zoro's character, confirming him as the 'dull' crew member Rayleigh mentioned.

keyMoments.title: Understands but Complains About Luffy's Decision
keyMoments.description: In Weatheria, Nami quickly understands the 3D2Y message but complains about Luffy's selfish decision-making without considering the crew's feelings.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Nami's intelligence and her emotional connection to the crew, balancing understanding with frustration at Luffy's unilateral decision.
keyMoments.quote: How selfish! Deciding on his own without thinking of our feelings again!

keyMoments.title: Deciphers Luffy's Message
keyMoments.description: After another failed escape attempt from Boin Archipelago, Usopp receives the newspaper and successfully understands the hidden 3D2Y message.
keyMoments.significance: Despite his comedic failures, Usopp demonstrates his intelligence and connection to his captain.

keyMoments.title: Understands the Message in Kamabakka
keyMoments.description: Despite his difficult circumstances in the Kamabakka Kingdom surrounded by okama, Sanji successfully deciphers Luffy's coded message.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's mental sharpness even in adverse conditions and his unwavering connection to the crew.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: First to Understand the Message
keyMoments.description: On Torino Kingdom, Chopper sits on a giant bird and receives the newspaper, immediately understanding Luffy's 3D2Y message and exclaiming his comprehension.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's intelligence and growth, showing he can decipher complex hidden messages despite his often naive personality.

keyMoments.title: Deciphers the Hidden Instruction
keyMoments.description: Riding in a horse-drawn carriage in Tequila Wolf, Robin reads the newspaper and calmly acknowledges understanding Luffy's coded message.
keyMoments.significance: Robin's expertise in interpreting hidden meanings makes her understanding particularly fitting and showcases her intellectual capabilities.

keyMoments.title: Understands Despite Heavy Damage
keyMoments.description: On Karakuri Island, despite being severely damaged from the explosion at Vegapunk's lab, Franky successfully deciphers Luffy's 3D2Y message.
keyMoments.significance: Even in his damaged state, Franky's technical intelligence and loyalty shine through as he understands the captain's intentions.
keyMoments.quote: I understood the message from Luffy!

keyMoments.title: Imprisoned but Aware
keyMoments.description: Brook appears imprisoned on Namakura Island, muttering about needing to escape his current situation while presumably having received news about Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Brook's predicament and establishes that he needs to escape captivity to reunite with the crew.

keyMoments.title: Accompanies Luffy to Training
keyMoments.description: Jinbe travels alongside Luffy and Rayleigh aboard the Kuja Pirates' ship, heading toward Luffy's training location.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jinbe's continued support for Luffy after the traumatic events at Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Cries for Ace at the Treehouse
keyMoments.description: Dadan leads her family to Ace and Luffy's old treehouse, crying out to Ace's spirit that his brother is alive and he can rest in peace.
keyMoments.significance: Emotionally powerful scene showing how those who raised Ace and Luffy are processing grief while finding comfort in Luffy's survival.
keyMoments.quote: Ace! Your brother whom you died saving is alive! You should rest in peace!

keyMoments.title: Boasts About Connection to Luffy
keyMoments.description: After Alvida informs him about Luffy's actions at Marineford, Buggy boasts about his fortune and connection to Luffy, showing off Captain John's treasure mark.
keyMoments.significance: Characteristically demonstrates Buggy's tendency to inflate his own importance and claim credit for circumstances beyond his control.
keyMoments.quote: The wind does not blow east or west but blows directly to me!

keyMoments.title: Informs Buggy About Luffy's News
keyMoments.description: Alvida tells Buggy about Luffy's recent escapade at Marineford and comments on his actions.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even early antagonists from Luffy's journey are keeping track of his growing notoriety.

keyMoments.title: Confused by Luffy's Tattoo
keyMoments.description: Vivi receives the news with joy but becomes perplexed when examining Luffy's arm tattoo, unable to decipher whether it's numbers, marks, or fashion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vivi's continued care for the Straw Hats while highlighting that the message was coded specifically for the crew members.
keyMoments.quote: What is on Luffy's arm? Are they numbers, marks, or some new fashion?

keyMoments.title: Observes Luffy's Actions
keyMoments.description: Three weeks after the war, Crocodile reads about Luffy's return to Marineford and wonders what Luffy, Jinbe, and Rayleigh are planning.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even former antagonists are tracking Luffy's movements, and Crocodile maintains his strategic mindset despite his defeat.
keyMoments.quote: It has been three weeks since the war and barely escaping death, I wonder what they are up to.

keyMoments.title: Defends the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Duval and his Rosy Life Riders successfully fight off the Coffee Monkeys who attempted to capture the Thousand Sunny for a Marine reward.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Duval's gratitude and unwavering loyalty to the Straw Hat Pirates, especially Sanji who changed his life by fixing his face.

keyMoments.title: Her Crew Escorts Luffy
keyMoments.description: Though not directly present, Hancock's orders to her Kuja Pirates crew are shown as they carefully tend to Luffy during his journey, ensuring he rests properly.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's continued care and affection for Luffy, using her authority to ensure his wellbeing.
